text:
Hi <@U01DQL7AMFH>!
The problem is we already created a custom object “Events” which relates to deals among others.

Now when we create a new deal instant it and can type in features like name etc we can’t specify it relates to this events despite having specified the connection in events.

This is then only possible once a deal is created through editing and we were wondering whether its also possible when you create a new deal as this would be one less step in the process so less likely for somebody to forget it!

Thank your for your help!

Ahh I get ya. I don't think you cna select custom objects in the standard HubSpot creation window, but I guess you can do it in 1 go if you created the deal via API

i.e:

• Create new Deal
• Query custom objects for the event by identifier
• create association
Just in-case anyone is searching and finds this, we have a guide for <https://developers.HubSpot.com/cms/guides/jquery/upgrade|upgrading to the latest version of jQuery>.
